0.1.name: wordpress/inline-mp3-player
0.1.description: Inline mp3 player replacing any link directly to a mp3 file, such as 'http://yoursite.com/musicfile.mp3' into a special link. Clicking it will turn the link into a small media player with a dhtml slider interface. It works simple, click the link the music starts playing. Drag the tab to browse throught the music. Click the link again to stop. This player uses Javascript Soundkit and the slider of Scriptaculous.
